at.irian.ankor.viewmodel.factory

Interface BeanFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBeanFactory, CglibProxyBeanFactory, ReflectionBeanFactory, SpringBasedBeanFactory

    public interface BeanFactory
    Ankor's View Model Bean Factory. All View Model Beans should be created by means of an Ankor BeanFactory. This ensures View Model compatibility with different run-time environments and independency of a specific IoC container.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T createAndInitializeInstance(Class<T> type, Ref ref, Object[] constructorArgs)
      Create a new instance of the given type.

    • Method Detail

      • createAndInitializeInstance

        <T> T createAndInitializeInstance(Class<T> type,
                                Ref ref,
                                Object[] constructorArgs)
        Create a new instance of the given type. Constructor matching follows this convention:
        1. Look for a constructor with a Ref as first parameter and additional parameters matching the given constructor arguments
        2. Look for a constructor with parameters matching the given constructor arguments
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of bean to create
        Parameters:
        type - type of bean to create
        ref - Ref, the newly created bean will be associated with
        constructorArgs - optional constructor arguments; may be empty but must not be null!
        Returns:
        newly created view model bean
